frontmatter.name: swChildComponentInBOMOption_e
frontmatter.description: Child component display options in Bills of Materials (BOM) for assemblies and for parts that have weldment/sheet metal cut lists.

title: swChildComponentInBOMOption_e
description: Child component display options in Bills of Materials (BOM) for assemblies and for parts that have weldment/sheet metal cut lists.

values.description: = Child components might be listed individually, depending on the properties that you selected when you created the BOM
= The model's configuration dissolves when it appears in a BOM; all of its child components are promoted one level
= Child components appear as single items in the BOM
